bug.author: ghchinoy
bug.summary: [TF 2.0 API Docs] tf - typo, extra symbols in pip install doc copy code
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Existing URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Copyable code block has extra characters ", at the end: pip install tensorflow==2.0.0-alpha0", <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
Copyable code block should be changed to the following to make copying easier. pip install tensorflow==2.0.0-alpha0 <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
This is the overview for the TF 2.0 API, but I couldn't find the docstring in the referred source: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r2.0/tensorflow/__init__.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r2.0/tensorflow/__init__.py</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Would love to, but couldn't find in source where this was a docstring or being generated :(

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ghchinoy>@ghchinoy</denchmark-link> Looks like this is fixed. Can you please let us know if you are happy to close if no issue persists. Thanks!
